Is this the final schematic for the latest one you have perfected?=A0 i.e. =
the one we have been waiting for with high hopes?=A0 I was waiting for the =
best one so my son can build it.=A0 =3DO)=A0 Hope you are feeling better.=
=A0 Keep the pain meds in your system so it does not wear off!=A0

ail.com> 
Description : Using the MK484 TRF chip as an additional IDF amp a=
nd audio detector. It has the advantage of have a variable AGC level. Use t=
his circuit with the sweep and audio circuits. 

You can access this file a=
t the URL:
